resources.string: The espresso, also known as a short black, is approximately 1 oz. of highly concentrated coffee. Although simple in appearance, it can be difficult to master
Americano are popular breakfast drinks and thought to have originated during World War II. Soldiers would add water to their coffee to extend their rations farther.
Cafe lattes are considered an introductory coffee drink since the acidity and bitterness of coffee are cut by the amount of milk in the beverage.
This creamy coffee drink is usually consumed at breakfast and is loved in the World. It is usually associated with indulgence and comfort because of its thick foam layer.
A flat white also originates from New Zealand and is very similar to a cappuccino but lacks the foam layer and chocolate powder. The drink is creamy rather than frothy.
The main peculiarity of is the drink thick and incredibly delicate. Rich aroma of espresso and gentle creamy vanilla flavor mix in this special coffee drink whipped into soft foam.
Pepperoni: Italian salami sausage with pork and beef, seasoned spicy, air-dried, renowned pizza topping.
